sections.1_story: Imagine you are splitting a bill between friends. If the total bill is Rs. 600 and you and your friend pay equal amounts, you can use a linear equation to find out how much each should pay. Linear equations help solve real-life problems where relationships are straight and direct, just like in many exam questions.
